data.title: [24-Hour Film Feast in memory of Esther Rolle dialogue with actor Antonio Fargas]
meta_keywords: Black Academy of Arts and Letters (Dallas
The Black Academy of Arts and Letters
Arts and Crafts - Theatre - Motion Pictures

data.meta_description: Video recording from The Black Academy of Arts and Letters recorded during the 2010 annual 24-Hour Film Feast in memory of actress Esther Rolle. The footage was shot during actor Antonio Fargas' dialogue on Rolle's pivotal work in American film and television held on Saturday, February 13th, 2010. The tape fades to black and then picks up with unrelated content around the 1:15:00 minute mark.
data.text:
Video recording from The Black Academy of Arts and Letters recorded during the 2010 annual 24-Hour Film Feast in memory of actress Esther Rolle. The footage was shot during actor Antonio Fargas' dialogue on Rolle's pivotal work in American film and television held on Saturday, February 13th, 2010. The tape fades to black and then picks up with unrelated content around the 1:15:00 minute mark.

Video recording from The Black Academy of Arts and Letters recorded during the 2010 annual 24-Hour Film Feast in memory of actress Esther Rolle. The tape fades to black and then picks up with unrelated content around the 1:15:00 minute mark.
